required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Profiling of Post Covid-19 Infection Patients: an Online Survey
clinical_study.official_title: Profiling of Post Covid-19 Infection Patients: an Online Survey

collaborator.agency: STIMULUS research group, Vrije Universiteit Brussel

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to explore the relation between indicators of central sensitisation, quality of life and functional status in patients post covid-19 infection.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 18 months after infection with Covid-19.
primary_outcome.description: Post-COVID-19 functional status is evaluated by the Post-COVID-19 Functional Status Scale.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 18 months after infection with Covid-19.
primary_outcome.description: The EuroQol with five dimensions and three levels is used to evaluate health-related quality of life.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 18 months after infection with Covid-19.
primary_outcome.description: Symptoms of central sensitisation are assessed by the Central Sensitization Inventory.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Persons who had a covid-19 infection.
arm_group.description: Male and female adults who were previously infected with covid-19.

intervention.description: Patients are asked to fill in an online survey regarding functional status, quality of life and symptoms of central sensitisation.
intervention.arm_group_label: Persons who had a covid-19 infection.

study_pop.textblock: In this study male and female adults who were previously infected with covid-19 will be eligible to complete the survey. No specific criteria will be imposed regarding the time frame after infection.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- male and female adults who were previously infected with covid-19
